decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Unnumbered Location Plan. Received 13/06/2017
284 006 A 015 G; 284 006 A 016 G. Received 08/01/2018. 284 006 A 016 G. Received 08/02/2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No development shall take place until the details and specification of the recreated lintels located over the entrance doors, windows and other openings, as shown on the approved drawings, including those located on the side elevations (where relevant) and detailed 1:20 drawings of the position of aforementioned lintels in relation to the windows, doors and other openings, are submitted and approved in writing by the local planning authority. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.
Condition : 4 - The insulated elevations of the buildings known as 11 and 12 Crane Avenue shall be painted in RAL 9010 and shall remain such thereafter.

Condition : 5 - The insulated elevations of the buildings known as 63 Crane Avenue, 57 Crane Avenue, 83 Crane Avenue, 85 Crane Avenue, 57 Dawes Avenue and 67 Dawes Avenue shall be painted in RAL 1002, with exception of the parts covered by lintels, and shall remain such thereafter.
description: Application of external wall insulation to 11, 12, 57, 63, 83, 85 Crane Avenue, 57, 67 Dawes Avenue
